author: martinc
msg: Update proposed freeze / tag date and open bug list.

author: cedric
msg: Remove the RequestUtils import, and thus the dependency with struts.
This allows to compile the Tiles package with Struts1.0 or without Struts.
In these two later compilations, struts1.1 dependent classes aren't use.

author: cedric
msg: Localize calls to RequestUtils in few struts (1.1) dependent classes.
This allows to compile the Tiles package with Struts1.0 or without Struts.
In these two later compilations, struts1.1 dependent classes aren't use.

author: cedric
msg: TilesUtil implementation  used when one single definition factory is shared
among modules. This allows backward compatibility.
TilesUtil implementation selection is done by TilesPlugin.
